It is a teaching hospital and research centre affiliated with McGill University, one of Canada's most prestigious universities. The MUHC is a major healthcare provider in the province of Quebec, serving over 1 million patients each year. It is also a leading research institution, with a strong focus on clinical trials, translational research, and innovation.
